Package org.apache.tools.ant.types.selectors

Interface ExtendFileSelector

All Superinterfaces:
FileSelector, Parameterizable, ResourceSelector
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseExtendSelector, ContainsRegexpSelector, ContainsSelector, DateSelector, DepthSelector, FilenameSelector, ModifiedSelector, SizeSelector, TypeSelector
public interface ExtendFileSelector
extends FileSelector, Parameterizable
This is the interface to be used by all custom selectors, those that are called through the <custom> tag. It is the amalgamation of two interfaces, the FileSelector and the Parameterizable interface. Note that you will almost certainly want the default behaviour for handling Parameters, so you probably want to use the BaseExtendSelector class as the base class for your custom selector rather than implementing this interface from scratch.
Since:
1.5
